articles.title: Grandfather pleads guilty in death of toddler who fell from cruise ship in Puerto Rico - CNN
articles.description: The grandfather charged in the death of his 18-month-old granddaughter who fell from a Royal Caribbean cruise ship last year pleaded guilty, the Puerto Rico Department of Justice announced Thursday.
